documentation.text:
@notice Allows contract owner to change annual interest rate. Reward earned up to that moment is calculated
 using previous interest rate.

@notice Allows contract owner to change reward time span. Reward earned up to that moment is calculated using
 previous timespan.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Pool's balance too low for covering annual reward"

arguments.value: Pool's balance too low for covering annual reward

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Pool's balance too low for covering annual reward"

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => struct DEFXStakingPool.StakedBalance storage ref[] storage ref)
struct DEFXStakingPool.StakedBalance storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@notice Allows any DEFX holder to stake certain amount of DEFX and earn reward. Reward is calculated based on
 the annual interest rate specified by annualInterestRate attribute and paid on basis specified by rewardTimeSpan
 attribute (daily, weekly, etc.). There is no automatic transfer of the reward, but stakers should redeem reward
 instead.
 Pre-condition for staking of DEFX is that the staker should approve address of this smart contract to spend
 their DEFX.

documentation.text: @return Earned reward for the staker up to that moment for specified staker's address
@return Staked amount of DEFX for specified staker's address

@dev Calculates reward based on the DEFX amount that is staked and the moment in time when it is staked.
 It first calculates number of periods (i.e weeks) passed between now and time when DEFX amount is staked 
 (timeSpanUnits). Then, it calculates interest rate for that period (i.e. weekly interest rate) as 
 unitInterestRate. Finally reward is equal to period interest rate x staked amount x number of periods.
@dev Calculates beginning of the current period for which reward is still not calculated.
@notice Enable recovery of ether sent by mistake to this contract's address.

@notice Enable recovery of any ERC20 compatible token sent by mistake to this contract's address.
 The only token that cannot be drained is DEFX.

 the annual interest rate specified by annualInterestRate attribute and paid on basis specified by rewardTimeSpan
 attribute (daily, weekly, etc.). There is no automatic transfer of the reward, but stakers should redeem reward
 instead.
 Pre-condition for staking of DEFX is that the staker should approve address of this smart contract to spend
 their DEFX.

attributes.text: @return Staked amount of DEFX for specified staker's address

@dev Calculates reward based on the DEFX amount that is staked and the moment in time when it is staked.
 It first calculates number of periods (i.e weeks) passed between now and time when DEFX amount is staked 
 (timeSpanUnits). Then, it calculates interest rate for that period (i.e. weekly interest rate) as 
 unitInterestRate. Finally reward is equal to period interest rate x staked amount x number of periods.
@dev Calculates beginning of the current period for which reward is still not calculated.
@notice Enable recovery of ether sent by mistake to this contract's address.

@notice Enable recovery of any ERC20 compatible token sent by mistake to this contract's address.
 The only token that cannot be drained is DEFX.

returns._0: Earned reward for the staker up to that moment for specified staker's address
Staked amount of DEFX for specified staker's address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

drainStrayEther(uint256).notice: Enable recovery of ether sent by mistake to this contract's address.

drainStrayTokens(address,uint256).notice: Enable recovery of any ERC20 compatible token sent by mistake to this contract's address. The only token that cannot be drained is DEFX.

redeemReward(uint256).notice: Allows staker to transfer earned reward to themselves.

redeemRewardToStaker(address,uint256).notice: Allows token owner to transfer earned reward to the staker.

setAnnualInterestRate(uint256).notice: Allows contract owner to change annual interest rate. Reward earned up to that moment is calculated using previous interest rate.

setRewardTimeSpan(uint256).notice: Allows contract owner to change reward time span. Reward earned up to that moment is calculated using previous timespan.

stake(uint256).notice: Allows any DEFX holder to stake certain amount of DEFX and earn reward. Reward is calculated based on the annual interest rate specified by annualInterestRate attribute and paid on basis specified by rewardTimeSpan attribute (daily, weekly, etc.). There is no automatic transfer of the reward, but stakers should redeem reward instead. Pre-condition for staking of DEFX is that the staker should approve address of this smart contract to spend their DEFX.

unstake(uint256).notice: Allows any DEFX holder who has previously staked DEFX to unstake it, up to the amount specified by input parameter. All reward earned up to that moment is calculated and needs to be redeemed sperately from unstaking. It can be done any time before or any time after unstaking.

withdrawUnusedBalance(uint256).notice: Allows contract owner to withdraw any DEFX balance from the contract which exceeds minimum needed DEFX balance. Minimum DEFX balance is calculated as a sum of all staked DEFX and reward that would be earned in the next year with the current annual interest rate.
